category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: ScheduleDeliverableWSOTypes
preference.preference_description: Defines the types allowed for the schedule deliverables within Schedule Manager. When adding a type, subtypes are not considered. For example, adding the Dataset type allows you to use Microsoft Word, Microsoft WordX, and Microsoft Excel.However, adding the Item type does not allow you to use the Document subtype of Item. If you have custom submittal types, add them as values to this preference so they are associated with schedule tasks in the schedule. Valid Values: The type of internal storage class names for any subtype of (and including) WorkspaceObject business object.
